entry.title: Hyde Park New Cairo
entry.summary: Hyde Park New Cairo is an upscale development situated in the heart of New Cairo. It offers a range of property types with sizes ranging from 217 to 1287 square meters. The project is being developed by Hyde Park with an estimated completion date of…
entry.content:
Hyde Park New Cairo is an upscale development situated in the heart of New Cairo. It offers a range of property types with sizes ranging from 217 to 1287 square meters. The project is being developed by  Hyde Park  with an estimated completion date of July 2026. The properties are being sold in a core and shell condition.

Hyde park new cairo prices 


The starting price for properties in Hyde Park New Cairo is 19,520,000 EGP, with a price per square meter of 69,617 EGP. The downpayment starts at 5% or 976,000 EGP, and there is a payment plan of 32 installments over 8 years. The monthly payment for a property in Hyde Park New Cairo starts at 193,167 EGP.

Discovering  : Facilities, Amenities and More

Amenities and Facilities: 

Hyde Park New Cairo offers a wide range of facilities and amenities for residents to enjoy. The development boasts expansive green spaces, landscaped gardens, and a clubhouse with state-of-the-art fitness facilities, swimming pools, and leisure areas. There are also sports courts for tennis and basketball, as well as gourmet dining options, cafes, and retail outlets. The project ensures the safety and comfort of residents with 24/7 security and concierge services to be one of the best compounds in egypt new cairo. 


Location: 


The location of Hyde Park New Cairo provides a perfect balance between accessibility and tranquility. It is easily accessible from major highways, allowing convenient connectivity to other parts of Cairo. The development is situated in a well-established and sought-after neighborhood, close to schools, universities, hospitals, and business districts. It is surrounded by shopping centers, restaurants, and entertainment venues, enhancing the convenience and appeal of the location.


Project Highlights: 


Hyde Park New Cairo offers a diverse range of residential options, including apartments, duplexes, penthouses, and villas. Each unit is meticulously designed with premium finishing and modern architecture that combines aesthetics with functionality. The development provides scenic views of landscaped parks, water features, and tree-lined streets, creating a picturesque ambiance. The community layout is well-planned, ensuring privacy, tranquility, and a sense of belonging.


Why Invest in Hyde Park New Cairo: 


Investing in Hyde Park New Cairo offers several compelling benefits. The project is located in a thriving and rapidly developing area of New Cairo, with strong demand for quality housing. The developer has a proven track record, ensuring high construction and delivery standards. Investors can expect potential rental income and capital appreciation due to the upscale amenities and strategic location. The diverse unit options cater to a wide range of tenants, appealing to families, professionals, and expatriates. The surrounding area's booming development contributes to the long-term growth potential of the investment.

In terms of distance to key landmarks, Hyde Park New Cairo is approximately 25 kilometers from Cairo International Airport, 40 kilometers from the Giza Pyramids, 20 kilometers from Al-Azhar Park, 15 kilometers from City Stars Mall, and 25 kilometers from Downtown Cairo.

Hyde Park New Cairo presents a luxurious and tranquil living experience in New Cairo. With its lavish amenities, prime location, and diverse residential options, it offers an exceptional investment opportunity for those seeking a premium residence or a strategic real estate investment.

entry.title: Best restaurant in new cairo
entry.summary: Egypt is known for its rich culinary traditions, and there are numerous restaurants throughout the country that offer a variety of delicious dishes. Here are a few popular restaurant options in Egypt New Cairo, a rapidly growing suburb of Cairo, Egypt, offers a wide range…
entry.content:
Egypt is known for its rich culinary traditions, and there are numerous restaurants throughout the country that offer a variety of delicious dishes. Here are a few popular restaurant options in Egypt

Best restaurant in new cairo 

New Cairo, a rapidly growing suburb of Cairo, Egypt, offers a wide range of dining options. While opinions on the "best" restaurant can vary based on personal taste, here are a few highly regarded restaurants in New Cairo 

Kazlak:

 Kazlak is known for its inviting atmosphere, with both indoor and outdoor seating options. The restaurant often creates a lively ambience, especially during evenings when live music performances take place. The menu at Kazlak includes a variety of Lebanese mezze (appetizers), such as hummus, tabbouleh, and moutabbal, as well as grilled meats like shish taouk (marinated chicken skewers) and kafta (spiced ground meat). They also serve traditional Lebanese desserts and beverages.

Mori Sushi:

 Mori Sushi offers a sleek and contemporary dining environment. The restaurant's menu features an extensive selection of sushi rolls, including both traditional and innovative creations. They use fresh ingredients and provide options for both raw and cooked sushi. In addition to sushi, Mori Sushi also offers other Japanese dishes like tempura, teriyaki, and udon noodles.

The Batter Half & Co.:

This café and bakery has a cozy and inviting atmosphere, with comfortable seating and a warm interior. The menu at The Batter Half & Co. includes a range of breakfast options, such as eggs benedict, pancakes, and omelets. They also serve a variety of sandwiches, salads, and artisanal bread. The bakery section offers freshly baked pastries, cakes, and desserts, making it an ideal spot for a sweet treat or a leisurely brunch.

El Dokan:

 El Dokan offers an authentic Egyptian dining experience. The restaurant's interior is designed to resemble a traditional Egyptian house, complete with rustic decorations and traditional furnishings. The menu features Egyptian classics like grilled meats (such as mixed grills and kofta), stuffed pigeon (a popular delicacy), and traditional Egyptian dishes like molokhia (green leafy vegetable stew) and koshari (a hearty dish made of rice, lentils, pasta, and caramelized onions).

Casper & Gambini's:

 Casper & Gambini's is a stylish and modern restaurant with a relaxed atmosphere. The menu is diverse, with options ranging from salads and sandwiches to pastas, pizzas, and grilled meats. They also offer vegetarian and vegan choices. Casper & Gambini's is known for using high-quality ingredients to create flavorful and well-presented dishes. The restaurant's outdoor seating area is particularly popular, providing a pleasant setting for dining.

entry.title: Best cafes in new cairo
entry.summary: New Cairo is a rapidly developing area in Cairo, Egypt, known for its modern infrastructure and amenities. While the café scene in New Cairo continues to evolve, here are some popular and highly regarded cafes that you can consider visiting Located in Cairo Festival City…
entry.content:
New Cairo is a rapidly developing area in Cairo, Egypt, known for its modern infrastructure and amenities. While the café scene in New Cairo continues to evolve, here are some popular and highly regarded cafes that you can consider visiting

cafes in new cairo 

 

Paul Bakery & Patisserie:

Located in Cairo Festival City Mall, Paul offers a cozy atmosphere and a wide range of delicious pastries, sandwiches, and coffee. It's a great spot for a quick bite or a leisurely brunch.

 

Greco's:

Greco café is known for its fresh and flavorful food, including sandwiches, salads, and desserts. They also serve a variety of coffee and tea options. The relaxed ambiance and friendly service make it a popular choice among locals.

Mori Sushi Café:

If you enjoy sushi and Japanese cuisine, Mori Sushi Café is worth a visit. Alongside their sushi offerings, they also have a cozy café area where you can enjoy a cup of coffee or tea.

The Batter Half & Co.:

This charming café is known for its delectable desserts, including cakes, pastries, and ice cream. They also serve a variety of coffee and tea options. The cozy and inviting atmosphere makes it a great place to unwind.

Beanos:

With multiple branches across Cairo, Beanos is a well-known café chain that offers a comfortable environment and a diverse menu. They serve a range of sandwiches, salads, and pastries, along with a wide selection of hot and cold beverages.

Costa Coffee:

A well-established international coffee chain, Costa Coffee has several branches in New Cairo. They serve a variety of coffees, teas, and snacks, and provide a relaxed setting for catching up with friends or getting some work done.

Crave:

Located in Rehab City, Crave is a trendy café known for its vibrant atmosphere and delicious food. They offer a diverse menu that includes breakfast options, sandwiches, salads, and desserts, along with a variety of beverages.

Coffee Corner:

Coffee Corner is a charming café known for its warm and inviting atmosphere. They have a wide range of coffee options, from classic to specialty brews, and their skilled baristas ensure a high-quality coffee experience. The café also serves delicious pastries, sandwiches, and salads, making it a great spot for a quick meal or a leisurely snack.

 

TBS - The Bakery Shop:

TBS is a well-known bakery and café in New Cairo. They offer a variety of freshly baked goods, including bread, pastries, cakes, and cookies. Their café area provides a comfortable setting to enjoy a cup of coffee or tea while indulging in their delightful treats.

Urban Station:

Urban Station is a trendy coworking space that also houses a café. It provides a modern and vibrant environment for remote workers, freelancers, and entrepreneurs. Alongside their coworking facilities, they have a café area where you can enjoy a range of coffees, teas, and light snacks while working or socializing.

Daily Roast:

Daily Roast is a specialty coffee shop that focuses on sourcing and roasting high-quality beans. They take pride in offering a selection of single-origin coffees and unique blends, prepared with precision and expertise. The café has a minimalist and contemporary design, creating a calm and cozy atmosphere for coffee enthusiasts.

Crumbs:

Crumbs is a bakery and café that specializes in artisanal bread and pastries. They have a wide array of baked goods, including croissants, baguettes, muffins, and cakes. The café area provides a cozy space to enjoy their freshly baked treats, accompanied by a cup of aromatic coffee or tea.

The Batter Half & Co. Roastery:

This establishment not only offers delectable desserts but also operates as a coffee roastery. They focus on sourcing high-quality coffee beans and roasting them in-house to create exceptional coffee blends. You can enjoy their freshly roasted coffee alongside their signature desserts and pastries.


Cup & Couch:

Cup & Couch is a charming café that offers a cozy and intimate atmosphere. They serve a range of coffee and tea options, including specialty brews and herbal infusions. The café also has a small selection of light bites and desserts, making it an ideal spot for a relaxed and peaceful break
